about_the_game:
Air Fleet is a strategy game with management elements, where you can take on the role of a director of a growing airline company. You will be responsible for planning new flight routes, acquiring models of real existing aircraft, and organizing flights around the world.

Create your own airline company

In Air Fleet, you will take on the role of a director of your own airline company. Plan the development of your company wisely, increase your capital, and become a world-class carrier!

Build flight routes

Connect real-world airports with high-speed air travel. Use an advanced flight planning system to create your own unique network. Today, all flights will depart without delays!

Expand your aircraft fleet

Air Fleet features over 100 models of real existing aircraft. Collect unique aircraft or lease them for immediate operation. Choose the best from your own fleet for your passengers.

Spread your influence worldwide

Become the world's largest airline company, transporting people and cargo around the world, from Canada to Australia. Transport passengers to the most popular destinations or reach the furthest corners of the world with unique long-range giants!

name: Air Fleet
short_description: Build your dream airline with Air Fleet! Plan routes, Expand your fleet, Organize flights around the world and Build a successful airline company!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
